# Path.IsNetworkDrive method

Checks if the given path is a network drive.

```csharp
public static bool IsNetworkDrive(string path)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| path | The path to check. |

## Return Value

true if is a network drive; otherwise false.
